titles.title: 410 God Leads Us Along (takes a little work)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In shady green pastures
So rich and so sweet
God leads
His dear children along
Where the water's cool flow
Bathes the weary one's feet
God leads
His dear children along

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Some thru the waters
Some thru the flood
Some thru the fire
But all thru the blood
Some thru great sorrow
But God gives a song
In the night season
And all the day long

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sometimes on the mount
Where the sun shines so bright
God leads
His dear children along
Sometimes in the valley
In darkest of night
God leads
His dear children along

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tho sorrows befall us
And Satan oppose
God leads
His dear children along
Through grace we can conquer
Defeat all our foes
God leads
His dear children along

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Away from the mire
And away from the clay
God leads
His dear children along
Away up in glory
Eternity's day
God leads
His dear children along
